paragraphs.title: Monthly tweets by users (only users with more than x tweets)

paragraphs.title: Daily tweets by users with more than x tweets per hour (Spark; using daily counter)
paragraphs.text:
%spark
val df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "tweets_counter_by_user_daily", "keyspace" -> "master_dataset" ))
  .load()
  
val df2 =   df.filter($"year".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp, "yyyy")) || $"year".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 2 MONTH"), "yyyy")))
            .filter($"month".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp, "MM")) || $"month".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 1 MONTH"), "MM")) || $"month".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 2 MONTH"), "MM")))
         //   .filter($"table_name".equalTo("tweets_berlin_by_user")) //$"table_name".equalTo("tweets_hamburg") || $"table_name".equalTo("tweets_berlin") || $"table_name".equalTo("tweets_anrainer") || $"table_name".equalTo("tweets_stakeholder"))
         //   .filter($"lang".equalTo("de") || $"lang".equalTo("en") )
            .filter($"tweets_counter">600)
            .selectExpr("table_name",
                        "year", 
                        "month", 
                        "day",  
                        "username",
                        "tweets_counter")
            
            
z.show(df2)

paragraphs.title: Hourly tweets by users with more than x tweets per hour (Spark)
paragraphs.text:
%spark
val df = sqlContext
  .read
  .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")
  .options(Map( "table" -> "tweets_counter_by_user_hourly", "keyspace" -> "master_dataset" ))
  .load()
  
val df2 = df.filter($"year".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp, "yyyy")) || $"year".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 7 DAYS"), "yyyy")))
            .filter($"month".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp, "MM")) || $"month".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 7 DAYS"), "MM")))
            .filter($"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp, "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 1 DAY"), "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 2 DAYS"), "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 3 DAYS"), "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 4 DAYS"), "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 5 DAYS"), "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 6 DAYS"), "dd")) || $"day".equalTo(date_format(current_timestamp - expr("INTERVAL 7 DAYS"), "dd")))
          //  .filter($"table_name".equalTo("tweets_hamburg") || $"table_name".equalTo("tweets_berlin") || $"table_name".equalTo("tweets_anrainer") || $"table_name".equalTo("tweets_stakeholder"))
         //   .filter($"lang".equalTo("de") || $"lang".equalTo("en") )
            .filter($"tweets_counter">30)
            .selectExpr("table_name",
                        "year", 
                        "month", 
                        "day", 
                        "hour", 
                        "username",
                        "tweets_counter")
            
            
z.show(df2)
